entities: International Tribunal for the Former Yugoslavia
summary:
Article 13 

1. Judges of the International Tribunal for Rwanda elect a President.

2. The President is a member of one of its Trial Chambers.

3. The President assigns judges to the Appeals Chamber of the International Tribunal for the Former Yugoslavia and Trial Chambers of the International Tribunal for Rwanda.

4. Members of the Appeals Chamber of the International Tribunal for the Former Yugoslavia also serve as members of the Appeals Chamber of the International Tribunal for Rwanda.

5. Each Trial Chamber elects a Presiding Judge to conduct proceedings.
